author: Simon Difford
description: Mezcal sings in this dry aperitif-style cocktail with delicate vinous notes and light gentian bitterness.
name: La Alianza
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
